name: Steel Alcimus
description: Steel Alcimus is a top-down helicopter shooter. Complete various tasks with your ally aircraft; such as saving the carrier, taking down the buildings, carrying objects, etc.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics
